posts.name: Trevor Biller
posts.cooked:
Hello everyone! The Signal team is releasing a new version of Signal Desktop, v7.59.0-beta.1. If you‚Äôre interested in participating, join the beta here.

Release notes:

  • This update enables GPU acceleration on Linux for improved performance and smoother video playback on supported hardware.

Commit changes: Comparing v7.58.0-beta.1‚Ä¶v7.59.0-beta.1 ¬∑ signalapp/Signal-Desktop ¬∑ GitHub

New Version: 7.59.0-beta.1

62 new commits since 7.58.0-beta.2:

Show commits

  • v7.59.0-alpha.1 [1]

  • Improve Error Handling from LibSignal's WebSocket Opens [2]

  • Migration to normalize all attachments [3]

  • Bump electron from 36.2.1 to 36.3.2 [4]

  • Delay storage service sync until empty [5]

  • Enable libsignal TLS 1.3 enforcement via config [6]

  • Improve use of libsignal for decryption [7]

  • Fix main window not showing on Linux with Wayland [8]

  • Update message attachment migration [9]

  • Add message schema version section to internal settings [10]

  • Centralize notification logic [11]

  • Remove Release Notes Feature Flag [12]

  • Move Profile Editor into the new Settings Tab [13]

  • [signalapp/Signal-Desktop#7345] Update primary device description [14]

  • Fix FunLightbox and FunTooltip [15]

  • Always use the websocket for chat requests [16]

  • Fix scrollbar border colors and positioning [17]

  • Settings Tab: When settings change, make proper updates [18]

  • Update windows image used for github actions runs [19]

  • Update to RingRTC v2.53.0 [20]

  • Settings Tab: Allow resizing the left pane [21]

  • Better state teardown in tests [22]

  • Unify shared group computation logic [23]

  • Fix button label for save dialog [24]

  • Show bottom-left profile photo in nightly builds and in development [25]

  • Fix focus UI for ListTile [26]

  • Add settings for local backups [27]

  • Start separating calls made to chat service [28]

  • Show error on invalid username links [29]

  • [signalapp/Signal-Desktop#7348] Prefer user's own reaction variant in ReactionViewer [30]

  • Add "This Message" reactions [31]

  • Settings Tab: Better layout for narrow windows [32]

  • Settings Tab: Educate user about change to bottom-left profile icon [33]

  • [signalapp/Signal-Desktop#7347] Update input padding for edit group modal [34]

  • Cleanup logging levels in WebAPI [35]

  • Strip filenames for visual media attachments during upload [36]

  • Replace buffer.slice() with buffer.subarray() [37]

  • Refactor build expiration checks [38]

  • When a profile fetch fails, warn and don't log callstack [39]

  • Settings Tab: Show updates dialog in all states but None [40]

  • Release notes bug fixes, unit tests [41]

  • Linkify untruncated text [42]

  • Enable GPU use on Linux [43]

  • Don't go to settings after showing ProfileMovedModal [44]

  • Release notes for 7.58.x [45]

  • Update strings [46]

  • Update DNS fallback [47]

  • Fix backdrop for video stories in StoryCreator [48]

  • Fix uncaught errors from ResizeObserver [49]

  • Skip flaky release notes fetcher service test [50]

  • Skip flaky release notes fetcher service test [51]

  • Initial settings donation pane [52]

  • Upload new set of PQ keys if too many exist [53]

  • Initial donationReceipts data types [54]

  • Add OS auth to local backup key viewer [55]

  • Rotate experimentalTransportEnabled.prod to .2 [56]

  • Update string for join group link error [57]

  • Backups: use new locatorInfo & mediaName [58]

  • Test: Add Linux GTK version switch for electron to fix test-node [59]

  • Release notes for 7.59 [60]

  • Update strings [61]

  • 7.59.0-beta.1 [62]

Gathered from signalapp/Signal-Desktop v7.58.0-beta.2‚Ä¶v7.59.0-beta.1

Localization changes

Note: after clicking a link, it may take a few seconds before GitHub jumps to the file (try scrolling a bit if it doesn‚Äôt).

At least 67 languages changed since 7.58.0-beta.2:

For technical reasons, not all languages may be listed below. However, everything from ‚ÄúUpdated language translations‚Äù and similar commits is listed, so the list is likely complete. You can view the full comparison to 7.58.0-beta.2 so far here.

Show changes
  • Afrikaans (af-ZA)
  • Albanian (sq-AL)
  • Arabic (ar)
  • Azerbaijani (az-AZ)
  • Basque (eu)
  • Bengali (bn-BD)
  • Bosnian (bs-BA)
  • Bulgarian (bg-BG)
  • Burmese (my)
  • Catalan (ca)
  • Chinese (zh-CN)
  • Chinese (zh-HK)
  • Croatian (hr-HR)
  • Czech (cs)
  • Danish (da)
  • Dutch (nl)
  • English (en)
  • Estonian (et-EE)
  • Finnish (fi)
  • French (fr)
  • Galician (gl-ES)
  • Georgian (ka-GE)
  • German (de)
  • Gujarati (gu-IN)
  • Hebrew (he)
  • Hindi (hi-IN)
  • Hungarian (hu)
  • Indonesian (id)
  • Irish (ga-IE)
  • Italian (it)
  • Japanese (ja)
  • Kannada (kn-IN)
  • Kazakh (kk-KZ)
  • Khmer (km-KH)
  • Kirghiz (ky-KG)
  • Korean (ko)
  • Latvian (lv-LV)
  • Lithuanian (lt-LT)
  • Macedonian (mk-MK)
  • Malay (macrolanguage) (ms)
  • Malayalam (ml-IN)
  • Marathi (mr-IN)
  • Modern Greek (1453-) (el)
  • Norwegian Bokm√•l (nb)
  • Panjabi (pa-IN)
  • Persian (fa-IR)
  • Polish (pl)
  • Portuguese (pt-BR)
  • Portuguese (pt-PT)
  • Romanian (ro-RO)
  • Russian (ru)
  • Serbian (sr)
  • Slovak (sk-SK)
  • Slovenian (sl-SI)
  • Spanish (es)
  • Swahili (macrolanguage) (sw)
  • Swedish (sv)
  • Tagalog (tl-PH)
  • Tamil (ta-IN)
  • Telugu (te-IN)
  • Thai (th)
  • Turkish (tr)
  • Uighur (ug)
  • Ukrainian (uk-UA)
  • Urdu (ur)
  • Vietnamese (vi)
  • Yue Chinese (yue)

Localization changes for the release are the same, as this is the first build of the release.
